data: The brilliant, spring day was inclining toward the evening, tiny rose-tinted cloudlets hung high in the heavens, and seemed not to be floating past, but retreating into the very depths of the azure.
Turgenev, Ivan Sergeevich, 1818-1883; Hapgood, Isabel Florence, 1850-1928 [Translator]
